structure.unit: Jurisdiction And Emblems Of The Commonwealth, The General Court, Statutes And Public Documents
Printing And Distribution Of Laws And Public Documents

law.catch_line: Payment Of Delivery Charges On Documents
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 10. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] Delivery charges on documents forwarded to members of the general court and to free public libraries shall be prepaid by the commonwealth.
